label: DRAW
description: A page with a drawing, map, painting, or schematic

label: DRAW_L
description: A page with a drawing or map presented in a table layout

label: LINE_HW
description: A page with handwritten text in a table layout

label: LINE_P
description: A page with printed text in a table layout

label: LINE_T
description: A page with typed text in a table layout

label: PHOTO
description: A page with a photograph or photographic image

label: PHOTO_L
description: A page with a photograph presented in a table layout

label: TEXT
description: A page with mixed handwritten, printed, or typed text

label: TEXT_HW
description: A page with only handwritten text in paragraphs

label: TEXT_P
description: A page with only printed text in paragraphs

label: TEXT_T
description: A page with only typed text in paragraphs
